title: Google\Cloud\RecommendationEngine\V1beta1\GcsSource
name: GcsSource
description:
Google Cloud Storage location for input content.

format.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.recommendationengine.v1beta1.GcsSource

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.input_uris
params.description: Required. Google Cloud Storage URIs to input files. URI can be up to 2000 characters long. URIs can match the full object path (for example, gs://bucket/directory/object.json) or a pattern matching one or more files, such as gs://bucket/directory/*.json. A request can contain at most 100 files, and each file can be up to 2 GB. See Importing catalog information for the expected file format and setup instructions.
